column4: hey officials, will there be a restricted modules package for the 2.6.17-50 kernel soon?
hey what about kernel 2.6.17-50 and restricted modules, anybody knows??
how to get the nvidia driver to work with that kernel?
nobody knows :(
i would like to switch to that new kernel
timo what version of kernel?
toma
did anyone tried 2.6.17-50 kernel?
yes.
its been set up for the better part of 2 years. Ive been using it for about 6 :)
the real question i guess, is why the heck doesnt it give me any debug info?!
what kind of debug info you are talking about
obviously.
im talking about the reason why the module wont get loaded... xorg.log doesnt say anything and neither does dmesg
it logs it if you change the driver in that config: /etc/X11/xorg.conf
yeh, but i was hoping it would give me some sort of useful info :/
i know i can get the display back using nv instead of nvidia.
so nvidia does not work, you didnt say that
oh ok, sorry.... thought it was the first thing i said
hmm are you shure, that you installed the right restricted modules for your kernel?
it was installed about 2 years ago and hasnt changed since. it was working yesterday aswell :/
i just fixed it then. thx for the advice :)
